News.headline: Tickets: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers' trip to The Shay tomorrow for the Emirates FA Cup replay, 7:45pm KO.
News.description:
The Daggers fans will be segregated from the home fans and based in the East Stand for the FA Cup replay at The Shay tomorrow night.

Ticket Prices:
Adults - £16.00
Concessions - £13.00
Under 16's - £5.00
Under 7's - £3.00

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Disabled fans will have to pay the age equivalent for the carer with the disabled fan going free of charge. Wheelchair fans will be asked to go to the Reception which is 100 yards away from the away turnstiles.

Please note that tickets will only be available to buy tomorrow from FC Halifax Town. 

Away guide for the game can be found here.
